page.title: Contact
page.p: If you are interested in the RECOIL project, please subscribe its mailing list. This list is for users and developers. Once you subscribe, you can post comments, ideas and questions about RECOIL.
You may submit bug reports and feature requests here.
Download the latest source release: or browse Git repository.

RECOIL is based on a development library, which you can easily embed in your program. It's not only a fully portable C library - it's better than that. Since RECOIL is written in Ć, it is also available as pure C++, Java, C# and JavaScript.
